title: US Bookkeeper
job_overview:
With more than 2 years Experience in US Bookkeeping (Texas Bookkeeping is an advantage)
Willing and able to work within 8AM to 4PM CST Time zone 
Proactive, with strong initiative and problem-solving skills
Excellent verbal and written communication skills

**Please submit your CV with the subject line: "US Bookkeeper" 
**Video Introduction -40 seconds minimum
**Only candidates who have met the qualifications and follow these instructions will be considered
